app.about.title: About Us
app.about.mission.title: Mission
app.about.mission.paragraph1: At Del Caribe Foods we are dedicated to building a trusting, long-lasting and profitable partnership with our clients, providing high-level end-to-end service while developing their brand.
app.about.mission.paragraph2: We value meeting our clients' standards with high-quality products while offering sustainable work opportunities for rural Costa Rican families.
app.about.vision.title: Vision
app.about.vision.paragraph: Our vision is to develop the best private label snacks for our international markets while providing high-quality products that are preferred by customers for delivering a fresh and authentic taste that reminds them of their homeland.
app.contact.title: Contact Us
app.contact.description: Please fill out the form below using detailed information and one of our associates will be contacting you as soon as posible.
app.contact.name: Name
app.contact.info.title: General Information
